text: Marie Gillain (born 18 June 1975) is a Belgian actress. In 1996 Gillain received the Prix Romy Schneider. She is single but has two daughters, Dune (born in 2004, from musician Martin Gamet) and Vega (born in 2009, from French-Italian actor Christopher Degli Esposti). ==Brief filmography== * Mon père ce héros (1991) - Véronique aka My Father the Hero * Un homme à la mer (TV) (1993) - Camille aka A Man at Sea * Marie (1994) - Marie * L'appât (1995) - Nathalie aka The Bait * Le affinità elettive (1996) - Ottilia * Un air si pur (1997) - Julie d'Espard aka An Air So Pure * Le Bossu (1997) - Aurore * La cena (1998) - Allieva aka The Dinner * Harem Suare (1999) - Safiye * Laissons Lucie faire! (2000) - Lucie * Barnie et ses petites contrariétés (2001) - Margot aka Barnie's Minor Annoyances * Absolument fabuleux (2001) - Safrane aka Absolutely Fabulous * Laissez-passer (2002) - Olga aka Safe Conduct * Ni pour, ni contre (bien au contraire) (2003) – Caty aka Not for or Against * Tout le plaisir est pour moi (2004) - Louise aka The Pleasure Is All Mine * L'enfer (2005) - Anne aka Hell * La voix de Laura (TV) (2005) - Laura * Black Box (2006) * Ma vie n'est pas une comédie romantique (2007) * Les Femmes de l'Ombre (2008) * La très très grande entreprise (2008) * Magique (2009) * Coco Before Chanel (2009) * All Our Desires (2011) ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian movie actors Category:Belgian stage actors Category:Belgian television actors Category:Belgian voice actors Category:People from Liège
title: Marie Gillain
